mapper.select: select t_student.u_no id, t_student.name sname, t_course.name cname, t_student.sex sex, t_student.birthday birthday, t_student.email email,t_student.phone phone, t_student.qq qq, t_student.schoolname schoolname, t_student.education education from t_user inner join t_student on t_user.no= t_student.u_no inner join t_course on t_student.cno = t_course.id where no = #{no}
